inputs.remark: 缺少 Visit 3 (fitting) 和 Visit 4 (Follow up)。

logic_summary: Added Visit 3 (Fitting) with Real Ear Measures verification.
Added Visit 4 (Follow up) with subjective outcome assessment.

value.collective_interpretation: The patient was fitted with a left BTE transcranial CROS hearing aid. Verification using Real Ear Measures (REM) confirmed that the aided response exceeded the unaided transcranial thresholds, ensuring signal crossover to the better ear.

tests.name: Real Ear Measures (REM)
tests.result_summary: Aided response (REAR) at 50, 65, and 75 dB SPL exceeded unaided transcranial thresholds.

value.collective_interpretation: Outcome assessment indicates the patient is extremely pleased with the transcranial CROS, preferring it to the standard CROS and reporting improved speech understanding.

tests.name: Subjective Assessment
tests.result_summary: Patient reports improved speech understanding and preference for the transcranial fitting.
